title: Project
text:
YDHR-Young Defenders of Human Rights 
young Defenders of Human Rights is a youth led civil society which envision to build a global network of empowered young defenders who collectively work as the first line of defense against the violation of human rights.
Our mission is to equip young people with the tools and knowledge to counter human rights violations in local and global contexts while amplifying youth voices in advocacy to create a just and equitable world.
BASE-Bachelors’ Advocacy for Social Empowerment 
Bachelors’ Advocacy for Social Empowerment (BASE) is dedicated to creating a transformative chain of change by democratizing education and empowering students from marginalized backgrounds. At the core of our mission lies a commitment to fostering inclusivity, equity, and social responsibilities.
We envision a future where every student, regardless of their socio-economic background, has equal access to opportunities and resources to thrive. By building a network of compassionate changemakers, BASE aspires to redefine the role of education as a tool for empowerment and lasting societal impact.
